field.label: enable
field.help: This will activate the RIP service if the support of routing protocols is enabled in "General".

field.label: Version
field.help: Choose your RIP version (1 or 2). 1 is classful, 2 supports CIDR.

field.label: Passive Interfaces
field.help: Select the interfaces, where no RIP packets should be sent to.

field.label: Route Redistribution
field.help: Select other routing sources, which should be redistributed to the other nodes.
field.hint: Type or select a route source.

field.label: Networks
field.help: Enter your networks in CIDR notation like 127.0.0.0/8.

field.label: Default Metric
field.help: Set the default metric to a value between 1 and 16.
